task_summary: The robot arm must avoid a visible obstacle and move to reach the scissors, using perception and precise navigation to circumvent obstructions.

task_long_description.overview: A white robotic arm on a cluttered table must reach a pair of scissors while avoiding a visible obstacle (box/books). The arm uses visual feedback to first locate the scissors, then approaches and realigns above and around the obstacle, finally reaching the scissors' location for potential task completion. The camera frames show close navigation between objects, requiring careful movements.
preconditions: Robot arm is initialized and ready.
Scissors and obstacle objects are on the table.
Cameras provide sufficient view for object detection.
stepwise_plan: Scan for the scissors if not immediately visible.
Move to a safe position above the scissors.
Approach and align over the scissors, avoiding the obstacle.
Make a lateral motion to bypass the obstacle.
success_criteria: Robot arm ends up at the scissors without disturbing the obstacle.
Scissors are within the gripping area of the end-effector.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect scissors: rescan, retry.
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when the robot reaches the scissors location or on repeated failure after retries.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if the scissors are currently visible to sensors.
Scans for the scissors using a raster pattern, up to 3 attempts.
Detects the exact position of the scissors.
Moves above the scissors to a safe vertical offset.
Approaches and aligns the end-effector over the scissors, with precise tolerance.
Performs a lateral movement along the y-axis to bypass the obstacle.
Moves the end-effector directly to the scissors for final positioning.

recovery_strategy: Retry after timeout or failed movement
assumptions: Instruction is 'avoid obstacle and reach the scissors', but frames suggest only navigation and not grasping is required.
Obstacle modeled implicitly as lateral MoveDelta.
If additional manipulation is required, further steps would be needed.

expected_success_criteria: Robot arrives at scissors position, no collisions with obstacle, scissors remain reachable.
